definition: governor (of a province or colony)/US state governor/premier (Australian states)
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
deputy governor (of a province or colony)/lieutenant governor of US state

sentences.english: So Governor, thank you for your leadership on this bill.
sentences.chinese: 所以州長先生，感謝你在這項法案上起到的領導作用。

sentences.english: Well, now he'stalking about running again for governor in 2010. He also said he'slooking forward to spending less time with his family.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，現在他又在要競選2010年州長了。

sentences.english: There is too much monkey business going on in the governor's office.
sentences.chinese: 州長辦公室搞鬼搞得太厲害了。

sentences.english: But the governor has not yet made any truly hard calls.
sentences.chinese: 但是州長還沒有出狠招。

sentences.english: Former governor of Utah, Jon Huntsman, is running for president.
sentences.chinese: 前猶他州長洪博培宣佈競選總統。

sentences.english: Was the first Asian-American to be governor of state in continental U. S.
sentences.chinese: 他是美籍華人在美國大陸的首位州長。

sentences.english: In the summer of 1983, the governors met in Portland, Maine.
sentences.chinese: 1983年夏天，各州州長們聚集在緬因州的波特蘭。

sentences.english: Hancock died while serving his ninth term as governor.
sentences.chinese: 漢考克逝世在他的第九屆州長任期上。

sentences.english: Tancredi’s only priority is his daughter, trapped in the anarchy.
sentences.chinese: 州長的唯一關心是自己被困在暴亂中的女兒。

sentences.english: He is ey(e)ing a run for the governor next year.
sentences.chinese: 他在考慮明年要競選州長。

sentences.english: There are new calls for South Carolina's embattled Governor to quit.
sentences.chinese: 又有新的呼聲要求南卡羅萊那州長辭職。

sentences.english: Haley Barbour said the initial focus was getting coastal residents back into their homes.
sentences.chinese: 州長黑利巴伯說，最初的重點是沿海的居民回家園。

sentences.english: Consul General Gao also invited Governor Fallin to lead a delegation to visit China at her convenience.
sentences.chinese: 高總還邀請福林州長在方便時率團訪華。

sentences.english: At the head of the table is Governor Tancredi.
HW1. The Illinois House impeaches Governor Rod Blagojevich.
sentences.chinese: 伊利諾亞州衆議院彈劾了州長羅德。

sentences.english: This week Mr Obama is front and centre in both states where governorships are up for grabs.
sentences.chinese: 本週，奧巴馬正集中精力應對兩個州的州長競選。

definition: member of the US House of Representatives
(Tw) Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, president 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Taiwanese variant of 奧巴馬|奥巴马[Ao4 ba1 ma3], Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
Minister of Education/Director of Education Department
